alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Faribault; Martin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 7:33PM CDT until May 11 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Faribault County in south central Minnesota... Eastern Martin County in south central Minnesota... Southeastern Blue Earth County in south central Minnesota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winnebago, or 13 miles northeast of Fairmont, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Delavan around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Minnesota Lake, Easton and Wells. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Minnesota.
